price: Na nimtendee wema mama yangu. Wala hakunifanya niwe jeuri, mwovu.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِي وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَلۡنِي جَبَّارٗا شَقِيّٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidatī walam yajʿalnī jabbāran shaqiyyan
